  • Reconnect Earth Supports Youth Mobilizing for Climate Action–Join Us!

    Something big is happening this month: Saturday, July 21st and the days leading up to it will mark the biggest youth of color-led mobilization for climate action in U.S. history. The Zero Hour movement was initiated by high school students in Seattle and has spread to become a nationwide uprising for just and equitable solutions … Continued
